page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content: Kingsland village has a 'bus service, run by a private company, to Leominster and Kington. There are 9 services per day and a 'bus runs from Leintwardine to Leominster on Market Day (Friday). There are connections from Leominster to Hereford by 'bus or by rail to Crewe and Cardiff with connections at Hereford for London and Birmingham. Eyton has no 'bus or rail service. Markham's garage runs the school bus to Wigmore and has a taxi service. Private companies run a school bus from Eyton to Luston, where the children attend the primary school, and from Eardisland to Kingsland School. A 'bus also takes the schoolchildren to Leominster once a week for swimming lessons. For outings, coaches are available from Leominster.
